title: 172. Matt Cosgrove With Adrian Beck: Dharma The Llama
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Matt Cosgrove, author and illustrator chats to Dani Vee and children's author Adrian Beck about Dharma The Llama, the Maccverse, the history of Macca, beautiful illustrations and success. Adrian Beck creates an interesting game based on Matt's past but is Matt up for the challenge?

description: Matt Cosgrove, author and illustrator chats to Dani Vee and children's author Adrian Beck about Dharma The Llama, the Maccverse, the history of Macca, beautiful illustrations and success. Adrian Beck creates an interesting game based on Matt's past but is Matt up for the challenge?
